videos.description: Malik Monk drives downcourt, goes behind his back and connects on a one-handed layup in midair.
videos.headline: Monk's insane crossover leads to midair layup in UK win

videos.description: Malik Monk scores 34 points and Isaiah Briscoe records just the third triple-double in Kentucky history as the Wildcats dispatch Ole Miss 99-76.
videos.headline: Monk, Briscoe carry Kentucky past Ole Miss
